item.title: Ticket #2737 (Future Post Stripped of Images) created
item.dc:creator: bloodylamer
item.description:
When a post is published into the future, all the image tags that were initially in the post get stripped of the url and the post is published w/ only the text and blank spaces for where the image should've been.

After the future post automatically publishes, the code is changed to this: 

<img />
THIS IS A TEST

Previously, there was a URL in the code.

item.title: Ticket #1540 (Date format returned by wp_get_archives is not localizable) updated
item.dc:creator: drssay
item.description:
second option

$text = sprintf(_('%1$s %2$d'), $month[zeroise($arcresult->month,2)], $arcresult->year);

I think that best solution using smallest edit.

patch attached.

item.title: Ticket #2712 (Need to filter posts before post_type and user checks) updated
item.dc:creator: ev3rywh3re

item.title: Ticket #2732 (translation impossible) updated
item.dc:creator: pandem
item.description:
The 2.0.2 POT file (â€‹http://svn.automattic.com/wordpress-i18n/pot/tags/2.0.2/wordpress.pot) contains every text string in latest WordPress release except for TinyMCE buttons, that must be translated in a different way (no gettext). TinyMCE help is included, though.

You probably downloaded the POT under /trunk, which is the development one.

item.title: class-snoopy.php.diff attached to Ticket #2733
item.dc:creator: JeremyVisser
item.description: A patch for class-snoopy.php to make the requested changes

item.title: Ticket #2701 (Centralize javascript inclusions) updated
item.dc:creator: ryanscheuermann
item.description:
Hey mdawaffe, first test found 1 small bug. dbx-admin-key-js.php needs to add 'link.php' to its test case: 

	case 'link-add.php' :
	case 'link.php':
              $man = 'linkmeta';

Otherwise, when I edit a bookmark, I get a DBX error about an invalid session ID.
